item.description:
Gerardi’s Italian Restaurant is a beautiful 55 seat dining room with a cozy bar offering full liquor. Established in 2000, the famiy continues to provide a quality dinner menu for everyone who loves fine Italian/Sicilian cuisine.

Offering traditional entrees, Chicken Parmigiano, Homemade Meatballs, Homemade Marinara, Picatta and Marsala sauces, fresh local seafood, and homemade desserts sure to please everyone.

Besides offering a Seasonal Three Course Dinner Menu for $20, Gerardi's has live entertainment on Wednesday nights!

Menu changes weekly for Three Course Dinner which includes:

1.  Choice of Soup, Salad or Appetizer; and

2.  4 Entrees to choose from; and

3.  Dessert
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the Girls Just Wanna Have Fun table!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Gerardi's Cafe-- Three Course Dinner Menu for $20 & Live Entertainment
